mapper.insert: insert into order_t (order_id, user_id, user_name, user_address, order_time, total_cost, pay_status, store_id, store_name) values(#{orderID},#{userID},#{username},#{userAddress},#{orderTime},#{totalCost},#{payStatus}, #{storeID}, #{storeName});
insert into order_detail(order_id, goods_id, goods_number, goods_name) values(#{orderID}, #{goodsID}, #{goodsNumber}, #{goodsName});
mapper.select: select o.order_id as orderID, o.user_name as username, o.user_address as userAddress, o.order_time as orderTime, o.total_cost as totalCost, d.goods_name as goodsName, d.goods_number as goodsNumber from order_t as o left join order_detail as d on o.order_id = d.order_id where store_id = #{id};

select o.order_id as orderID, o.order_time as orderTime, o.user_name as username, o.user_address as userAddress, o.total_cost as totalCost, o.store_name as storeName, d.goods_number as goodsNumber, d.goods_name as goodsName from order_t as o left join order_detail as d on o.order_id = d.order_id where user_id = #{id};
